name: quotable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Quotable words are suitable for being quoted (= repeated by someone else): highly quotable She became a familiar figure, thanks in part to her highly quotable comments on a range of issues. This film is filled with famous quotable lines.
A quotable person says a lot of things that are worth quoting (= repeating): eminently quotable He was eminently quotable and popular with journalists. She is one of the sport's all-time greatest and most quotable players.
More examplesFewer examplesShe doesn't post very much on social media, but when she does it is very quotable.He is an endlessly quotable advocate for himself and all of his wealthy clients.
